title: Chanterelle and pancetta tartlets
ingredients: ['1 dessertspoon olive oil', '2 large shallots, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '225g (8 oz) chanterelle mushrooms, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon brandy', '1/2 teaspoon minced fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 egg', '4 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', '60g (2 oz) grated Gruyere cheese', '2 tablespoons cream cheese, softened', '2 slices pancetta, cooked and diced', 'shop-bought puff pastry sheets, formed into 24 mini tart cases']
